situation:
A 150mm thick slab has the following specifications:
f'c=27.5MPa
Clear concrete cover = 20mm
fy = 275MPa for 12mm⌀ and 10mm⌀ bars
fy = 413MPa for 16mm⌀ bars

subquestions.question: Determine the ultimate flexural strength (in kN-m) of the slab if it is reinforced with 10mm⌀ bars spaced at 125mm center to center.
Determine the ultimate flexural strength (in kN-m) of the slab if it is reinforced with 16mm⌀ bars spaced at 200mm center to center.
If 10mm⌀ bars are replaced with 12mm diameter bars, what is the spacing (in mm) of the 12-mm diameter bars?
